extension.dc:title: GGBN Preservation Extension
extension.name: Preservation
extension.dc:description: Support for all kinds of preservations as an extension for Material Sample core sample data in Darwin Core. Intended to be a one to many relation to the Material Sample core.

property.name: preservationType
property.dc:description: Type of Specimen, Tissue, DNA or DNA Preservation or Storage
property.examples: dried, silica, alcohol, FTA card, tube, QIAsafe

property.name: preservationTemperature
property.dc:description: Temperature of Specimen, Tissue, DNA or RNA Preservation or Storage

property.name: preservationDateBegin
property.dc:description: Start of current Specimen, Tissue, DNA or RNA Preservation

property.name: sequence
property.dc:description: can be used to describe sequence (order) of different preservations or other issues
